records.name: Meeting hours
records.description: Meeting hours are from 11 to 17 Kyiv time

records.name: Being a professional
records.description: Best practice = professional approach + friendly atmosphere

records.name: Direct feedback
records.description: Practice direct feedback

records.name: E-mails & invitations
records.description: Check your e-mails at least once a day and send responses to invitations!

records.name: Respect
records.description: Respect your colleagues

records.name: All-Hands and weekly meetings
records.description: Weekly meetings are for everyone + all-hands

records.name: Working hours
records.description: Came early? Write a [time] e-mail when leaving

records.name: Timeliness
records.description: Start, finish and come to the meetings on time

records.name: Strong language
records.description: Avoid using strong language at the office

records.name: Kitchen
records.description: Wash your dishes and clean the kitchen after yourself: tables, fridge and cupboards

records.name: Device tracker
records.description: Mandatory: reserve a device on the Device Tracker page

records.name: Turn off
records.description: Turn off a device before leaving it on the shelf when finished using it

records.name: Entertainment
records.description: Distractions & entertainment should not be parallel with work

records.name: Meetings are priority
records.description: Do not bother people at the meeting

records.name: Keeping to the point
records.description: Keep your discussions relevant (no non-related topics)

records.name: Knowledge share
records.description: Share your knowledge

records.name: Noise
records.description: Reduce the noise level in the open space

records.name: Preparation
records.description: Prepare to the meetings and create them with a comprehensible agenda

records.name: Messengers
records.description: Check HipChat and other communication channels at least once a day

records.name: Sounds & music
records.description: Test the sounds only in headphones. Turn off the sound in the headphones when leaving your working place

records.name: Charge
records.description: Put a device on charge when leaving it in the cell

records.name: No OS update
records.description: Do not update the OS

records.name: Ringtones
records.description: Switch off phone ringtones

records.name: Respect & Politeness
records.description: Cleaning after yourself is a common courtesy

records.name: Private talks Vs. Work talks
records.description: Hold all telephone and private talks in the meeting rooms

records.name: Vacation
records.description: Going on vacation? Put it into semesterlistan in advance!

records.name: Bathrooms
records.description: Keep it clean. You know what we mean

records.name: Meeting-free Wednesday
records.description: Wednesday is meeting-free

records.name: Time tag
records.description: Late, leaving early or OOO? Yes. Write a [TIME] e-mail
